DOC.brief_summary: The study is intended to test the image quality of the FICE system to the predicate device, Narrow Band Imaging (NBI). The hypothesis is the images are of equal quality.
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Flexible Spectral-Imaging Color Enhancement (FICE) With Olympus Narrow Band Imaging (NBI)
DOC.criteria: Referred for diagnostic endoscopy or colonoscopy Ability to comply and willingness to partake in study less than 21 years of age is an inmate
